full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,GA-YANG BAR BZHI'I TSE THAR GTONG BA TSUL DANG DPA' CHAS SOGS BSRUNG BA'I DBANG PO RNAMS LA 'BUL TSUL NGO MTSAR RGYAN GYIS 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (GA-YANG BAR BZHI'I TSE THAR GTONG BA TSUL DANG DPA' CHAS SOGS BSRUNG BA'I DBANG PO RNAMS LA 'BUL TSUL NGO MTSOR RGYAN GYIS 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGAGS 'CHANG RNAL 'BYOR BA KHA CHEN THOR DBANG RGYAL KHAMS @009A *, ,SU SBYAR BA'I YIG CHAS DANG, BLA MA BRAG SPUN MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA GNYIS LA GZHI BYAS CUNG ZAD KHA BSKANG DGOS  PA RNAMS KYIS KHA SKANG NAS LEGS PA'I DON CHA THAMS CAD PHYOGS GCIG TU GZHAN PHAN GYI'I PHYIR BSGRIGS PA DGE ZHING BKRA SHIS, ,'ON KYANG 'OD KYIS 'CHA 'DI RU TSE THAR RNAMS TSIG GI SGO NAS LHA 'DI LTA BU LA BRTZON ZER BA DANG, ,YIG CHA RNAMS BON LUG SU DAR 'DUG 'DI YANG MI 'THANG BSAM, AU RGYAN PADMA'I GSUNGS LA, DUS NGAN BSKAL BA'I SNYIGS MA LA, ,BKA' NYAN BZHIN MI BYED RANG BZO YIS, ,BAN DPON GYIS LTA BSRUNG RNAMS, ,GSOL SOR GSOL MCHOD BYED PA DANG, ,DGE LDIG 'TSOL BUR RANG BZO SPYOD PA'I DUS, ,MI 'DOD SNA TSOGS 'BYUNG BAR DES, ,ZHES GSUNGS SO, ,DES DE BZHIN DU RANG RANG GI LHA BSRUNG RANG LUGS GI SGO NAS MCHOD DGOS PA NI, ,LUNG LAS GSUNGS PA KUN GYI YID MCHES PA'I GNAS SU GYIS SHOG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
